property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Returne from whence ye came. . . ." - Edmund Spenser, *The Faerie Queene*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He holds the keys to a tombful of incarcerated secrets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whenever the Llanowar elves gather the fruits of their forest, they leave one plant of each type untouched, considering that nature's portion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it." - Herman Melville, *Moby Dick*

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power." - Rene Descartes, *Discourse on Method*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control. Dauntless Dourbark has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A well-trained force brings peace... which brings more time for training!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer-both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're going to need a bigger gate." - Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life. When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered." "Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had entered a land like an open grave-an act of fortitude or folly?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?" - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack. Whenever chaos ensues, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All permanents untap during each player's untap step. Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If the player loses the flip, counter that spell. Whenever chaos ensues, target player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Tember City deals 1 damage to that player. Whenever chaos ensues, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.) Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world." - Ayli, Kamsa cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mitotic Slime dies, create two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't expect you to understand the myriad ways in which you're about to die."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm calling in a favor from an old friend. Once you're all dead, I'll consider the matter settled."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up.) At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one.

card.name: Drench the Soil in Their Blood

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are they dead yet? No? Then my previous order stands."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during their untap step. When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heart of a golem gives life to more than just the iron husk around it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

property.value: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Maul Splicer enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature tokens. Golem creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Priest of Urabrask enters the battlefield, add {R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast this spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?" - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.
